content:
Hoho, no need to worry!
I'll be here to support you with everything about relocating.
But, to ensure that future neighbors feel at ease when moving in...
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content:
That at least requires
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> to build a house,
pick some suitable furniture, and decorate your new home.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: First, we need to understand the ecological environment of our Astralink, for example, through the <color=#8AAB4B>Ecological Vitality Survey</color> we conducted.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content:
And if you ever feel lost in life,
I hope this can offer some guidance.
But in the end, your life is still yours to live as you wish.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content:
And third,
I hope that one day,
you'll successfully invite new neighbors to settle here.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho, slow down, don't worry. It may appear complicated, but in reality, everyone's living satisfaction is the only criterion.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Ah, for reaching the rating of <color=#8AAB4B>"Living a Simple Life"</color>, hoho, that's something you'll have to figure out on your own.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho! It's a pleasure to sign the Living Services Agreement with <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: The TV functions are still under development hoho~! But now, you can utilize TV shopping, and the goods you purchase will be delivered via PuffPost in an hour.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Now, allow me to introduce you to the aforementioned Astralink comfortable living indicator — the <color=#8AAB4B>"Neighbor-Good Radar"</color>!
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Second, we need to reach the appropriate rating that represents our comfortable living in the <color=#8AAB4B>Neighbor-Good Radar</color> of Loomi Co.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Ah, forgive me, I'm blabbering. Don't worry, the <color=#8AAB4B>Neo Astralink Guidebook</color> is intended to help build Astralink Stations, not pressure.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: After building a house, you still need to buy and make furniture and decorate the house in order to get a good rating in "<color=#8AAB4B>Home Decor</color>."
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Explore other Bubble Worlds to quickly accumulate the Dough you need to build houses. Plus... Hohoho, you might even run into a <color=#8AAB4B>new neighbor</color>.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Loomi TV is a reward from Loomi Co. for establishing Astralinks. {短暂停}It has phases.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Ah, my apologies! I want to take this chance to formally talk to you about the Neo Astralink Guidebook that our Astralink Station needs to complete.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: The Neighbor-Good Radar will rate life on the Astralink based on <color=#8AAB4B>Alleyway Space</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Home Decor</color>, and <color=#8AAB4B>Neighborhood Life</color>.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Let's first check it out on our phones to see how <color=#8AAB4B>Neighbor-Good Radar</color> works.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Before that, we have to wait for <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color> to get her house built. She's having a bit of trouble with it. If you have time, please lend her a hand.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Building the house and furnishing it requires a lot of Dough... This is the <color=#8AAB4B>Jar of Lumia</color> you'll need for expeditions, please accept it!
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: If you want to head out, give the Jar of Lumia to <color=#8AAB4B>Esassani</color>. She'll make sure the Astralink's safe.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Whether you are out on a trip, gathering Dough, or continuing your ecological vitality survey, please arrange your schedule based on your preferences ho~!
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Continuing the collection of various ecological samples is a good choice, but the Ecoglobe has limited support space...
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Oh, but the <color=#8AAB4B>Omni-Gallery</color> currently under pre-construction meets our needs perfectly, so please keep an eye out for it.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: The modest wish for comfortable living is having a house, but true comfort in life means more than just the size of your home. Having ideal furnishing and a friendly space are more important.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Oh, one more thing. Please accept <color=#8AAB4B>Murmurs</color>, the messaging app that everyone uses for ease of contact.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: And since it's a TV, it can also receive Astralink TV signals. In the future, you'll also be able to tune into various interesting TV programs.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> might be bombarded by Murmurs in the future. After all, you are everyone's most trusted person.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho! We're still thinking about what else we can do on top of the Ecoglobe.
info: 送航路计划书-莫白_安居线
